thoughts.title: The Art of Code
thoughts.content: Code is not just logic; it is a form of expression. Like poetry, it can be elegant, concise, and powerful.

thoughts.title: Why I Love SVGs
thoughts.content: Scalable Vector Graphics are amazing. They are resolution-independent, manipulatable with code, and lightweight.

thoughts.title: Minimalism in Design
thoughts.content: Less is often more. By removing clutter, we allow the content to shine and the user to focus.
